addCriteria

void addCriteria(FullTextFieldCriteria fullTextFieldCriteria,
                 FullTextTopicQuery fullTextTopicQuery,
                 boolean fuzzy,
                 org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader indexReader)
Add FullTextFieldCriteria to the processing query. If the FullTextTopicQuery contains either of the criteria terms then add its values to the query.

Parameters:
fullTextFieldCriteria - the fullTextCriteria
fullTextTopicQuery - it can be null.
fuzzy - if true then the these criteria processed as fuzzy query
indexReader - an indexReader to index repository
